name: iPuray
0:
”Alexa,turn on the e380”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
About iPuray:
After binding to your iPuray App account, you can control your iPuray smart products through echo sound.
The current functions are: control the iPuray series of intelligent products, we will continue to upgrade in the future, to achieve more functions.
How to use:
1. Successfully distributed iPuray products:
A) scan the qr code on the product manual, download the "iPuray" APP, register and log in.
B) install the equipment and power it on (e380 is only in distribution mode within the first 5 minutes of power on)
C) network distribution operation: according to the instructions in iPuray APP, complete the network distribution of the device.
2. Bind the iPuray product device to the account corresponding to the iPuray APP
A. open Alexa App, search ipuray in skills, click "enable to use", and then jump to the account association page.
Enter the account you registered in the iPuray App to complete the binding authorization.
B. Echo sound can be used for voice control of the smart devices with the successful distribution network under iPuray app.
You encounter any problem in the process of use, you can contact us to solve: 075589748200
